name: Worldwide, domestic, and foreign R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company, R&D employment, and R&D cost per R&D employee, by industry and company size: 2022
description: Worldwide, domestic, and foreign R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company, R&D employment, and R&D cost per R&D employee, by industry and company size: 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_company_performed_r_d_us_millions_worldwide
variableMeasured.description: Company Performed R D Us Millions Worldwide

variableMeasured.name: field_company_performed_r_d_us_millions_domestic
variableMeasured.description: Company Performed R D Us Millions Domestic
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars, number of employees in thousands, and cost per employee in thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_company_performed_r_d_us_millions_foreign
variableMeasured.description: Company Performed R D Us Millions Foreign
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars, number of employees in thousands, and cost per employee in thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_employment_thousands_domestic
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars, number of employees in thousands, and cost per employee in thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_employment_thousands_foreign
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars, number of employees in thousands, and cost per employee in thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_company_performed_r_d_per_r_d_employee_us_thousands_per_employee_worldwide
variableMeasured.description: Company Performed R D Per R D Employee Us Thousands Per Employee Worldwide

variableMeasured.name: field_company_performed_r_d_per_r_d_employee_us_thousands_per_employee_domestic
variableMeasured.description: Company Performed R D Per R D Employee Us Thousands Per Employee Domestic
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars, number of employees in thousands, and cost per employee in thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_company_performed_r_d_per_r_d_employee_us_thousands_per_employee_foreign
variableMeasured.description: Company Performed R D Per R D Employee Us Thousands Per Employee Foreign
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars, number of employees in thousands, and cost per employee in thousands of U.S. dollars

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Ratios were calculated using unrounded data. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded $50,000 or more of R&D and are not comparable with estimates published for years prior to 2018.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2022.
